title: Corruption -> LeaverBuster
body:
I'm not going full formal mode on this one, so my apologies.

I've experienced an issue twice, where LoL just keeps bugsplatting. Restarting it uncovers that the download is corrupt. This can happen, and I'm most certainly not blaming Riot.

What I am kind of... Agitated about is that the second time this has happened, I have received a 5 game Low Priority Queue. This is, in my opinion, not correct. I have messed up though, by not saving the proof.

Can someone please explain why this even happens, and why you should even receive a LeaverBuster for a corrupted download?

Sincerely:
-Killing Targets{{champion:412}} .

replies.body:
Disconnections from matches negatively impact everyone in the match, even if the disconnection was not intentional. This is a reason why all disconnections are treated equally and why penalties cannot be removed or modified.

Since your League assets keep becoming corrupted, I recommend completing a clean reinstall of League using our [Hextech Repair Tool.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) Simply run the app, check the boxes for *Reinstall* and *Clean reinstall*, then launch League afterward to finish patching.

Let me know if this issue persists through those changes.
